posts.post_content:
Hello everyone,

My t206 quest is TEMPORARILY taking a giant step backwards due to my daughter's wanting to study in Italy next semester.  I plan on putting my t206 cards up on eBay over the next few weeks but I thought that I would offer them here first.  There are many Hall of Famers and rare cards available.  I'm mainly just looking to get out of them what I paid.  All cards can be viewed at:
 
[url]http://www.psacard.com/SetRegistry/publishedset.aspx?s=52683&ac=1[/url]

Individual scans available on request.  Shipping is on me.  Checks, money orders, & paypal are all acceptable.  My eBay feedback can be checked under user name "rknfurnish"  I can also be emailed at [url]rknfurnish@aol.com[/url]


Here's what is available:

Ron,

       I assume you received my message regarding my interest in Downs. I haven't received a response, but notice Downs is "pending". My email is [url]timothy_browne@hotmail.com[/url]          Thanks. Tim

Tim,

I have set the Downs aside for you.  I sent out an email to you but I must've not have hit "send", I guess.  The Downs is a pretty neat card....a very innocent looking pink portrait showing his youthful innocence prior to his run ins with the law...

Thanks,
Ron
[url]rknfurnish@aol.com[/url]
